status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Just curious: does STORM-2693 give enough impact to replace Pacemaker? Ideally we should let Pacemaker fading out since it was just born to resolve specific limitation, and I believe Oath has most biggest Storm cluster(s).

I have not done any scale tests, but if we want to mark pacemaker as deprecated I would be +1.  And we can remove it in 3.x.  But for us to be able to do a rolling upgrade we still need to support pacemaker in 2.x

revans2

I just thought out loud: it was based on ideal thought and I think we can't deprecate pacemaker without proper scale tests.

Thanks agresch,
